verses.verse: וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after תַּ֣מּוּ <S%H8552><s%> were clean כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּ֔וֹי <S%H1471><s%> And it came to pass when all the people לַעֲב֖וֹר <S%H5674><s%> passed over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan פ וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

קְח֤וּ <S%H3947><s%> Take לָכֶם֙ מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> out of the people שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> ten אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H582><s%> men אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> a man אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> out of every אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> one מִשָּֽׁבֶט׃ <S%H7626><s%> tribe

וְצַוּ֣וּ <S%H6680><s%> And command אוֹתָם֮ <S%H853><s%> לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> ye them saying שְׂאֽוּ־ <S%H5375><s%> Take לָכֶ֨ם מִזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> here מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> you hence out of the midst הַיַּרְדֵּ֗ן <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan מִמַּצַּב֙ <S%H4673><s%> stood רַגְלֵ֣י <S%H7272><s%> feet הַכֹּהֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> out of the place where the priests' הָכִ֖ין <S%H3559><s%> firm שְׁתֵּים־ <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> ten אֲבָנִ֑ים <S%H68><s%> stones וְהַעֲבַרְתֶּ֤ם <S%H5674><s%> and ye shall carry them over אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> עִמָּכֶ֔ם <S%H5973><s%> you וְהִנַּחְתֶּ֣ם <S%H3240><s%> with you and leave אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> בַּמָּל֕וֹן <S%H4411><s%> them in the lodging place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> you תָּלִ֥ינוּ <S%H3885><s%> where ye shall lodge ב֖וֹ הַלָּֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> this night ס

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> called יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <S%H3091><s%> Then Joshua אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about שְׁנֵ֤ים <S%H8147><s%> both הֶֽעָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> ten אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom הֵכִ֖ין <S%H3559><s%> whom he had prepared מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> a man אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> out of every אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> men אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> one מִשָּֽׁבֶט׃ <S%H7626><s%> tribe

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָהֶם֙ יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua עִ֠בְרוּ <S%H5674><s%> unto them Pass over לִפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> before אֲר֧וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> your God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into תּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> into the midst הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan וְהָרִ֨ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> and take ye up לָכֶ֜ם אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֶ֤בֶן <S%H68><s%> of you a stone אַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> every עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שִׁכְמ֔וֹ <S%H7926><s%> upon his shoulder לְמִסְפַּ֖ר <S%H4557><s%> according unto the number שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> of the tribes בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

לְמַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of תִּֽהְיֶ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> become זֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise א֖וֹת <S%H226><s%> That this may be a sign בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֑ם <S%H7130><s%> among כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יִשְׁאָל֨וּן <S%H7592><s%> ask בְּנֵיכֶ֤ם <S%H1121><s%> you [that] when your children מָחָר֙ <S%H4279><s%> [their fathers] in time to come לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying מָ֛ה <S%H4100><s%> What הָאֲבָנִ֥ים <S%H68><s%> stones הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לָכֶֽם׃

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֣ם <S%H559><s%> Then ye shall answer לָהֶ֗ם אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> Because נִכְרְת֜וּ <S%H3772><s%> were cut off מֵימֵ֤י <S%H4325><s%> them That the waters הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan מִפְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> before אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּעָבְרוֹ֙ <S%H5674><s%> when it passed over בַּיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan נִכְרְת֖וּ <S%H3772><s%> were cut off מֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> the waters הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan וְ֠הָיוּ <S%H1961><s%> shall become הָאֲבָנִ֨ים <S%H68><s%> and these stones הָאֵ֧לֶּה <S%H428><s%> shall be for לְזִכָּר֛וֹן <S%H2146><s%> shall be for a memorial לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever

וַיַּעֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> did כֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> Thus בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוֹשֻׁעַ֒ <S%H3091><s%> so as Joshua וַיִּשְׂא֡וּ <S%H5375><s%> and took up שְׁתֵּֽי־ <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵ֨ה <S%H6240><s%> ten אֲבָנִ֜ים <S%H68><s%> stones מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> out of the midst הַיַּרְדֵּ֗ן <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua לְמִסְפַּ֖ר <S%H4557><s%> according to the number שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> of the tribes בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיַּעֲבִר֤וּם <S%H5674><s%> and carried them over עִמָּם֙ <S%H5973><s%> with אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> them הַמָּל֔וֹן <S%H4411><s%> with them unto the place where they lodged וַיַּנִּח֖וּם <S%H3240><s%> and laid them down שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וּשְׁתֵּ֧ים <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> ten אֲבָנִ֗ים <S%H68><s%> stones הֵקִ֣ים <S%H6965><s%> set up יְהוֹשֻׁעַ֮ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst הַיַּרְדֵּן֒ <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan תַּ֗חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash מַצַּב֙ <S%H4673><s%> stood רַגְלֵ֣י <S%H7272><s%> in the place where the feet הַכֹּהֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests נֹשְׂאֵ֖י <S%H5375><s%> which bare אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הַבְּרִ֑ית <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant וַיִּ֣הְיוּ <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> are there עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> and they are there unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֞ים <S%H3548><s%> For the priests נֹשְׂאֵ֣י <S%H5375><s%> which bare הָאָר֗וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark עֹמְדִים֮ <S%H5975><s%> stood בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst הַיַּרְדֵּן֒ <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> until תֹּ֣ם <S%H8552><s%> was finished כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> everything הַ֠דָּבָר <S%H1697><s%> until every thing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֨ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua לְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> to speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people כְּכֹ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> according to all that Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua וַיְמַהֲר֥וּ <S%H4116><s%> hasted הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people וַֽיַּעֲבֹֽרוּ׃ <S%H5674><s%> and passed over

וַיְהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> become כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after תַּ֥ם <S%H8552><s%> were clean כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And it came to pass when all the people לַֽעֲב֑וֹר <S%H5674><s%> passed over וַיַּעֲבֹ֧ר <S%H5674><s%> passed over אֲרוֹן־ <S%H727><s%> that the ark יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> and the priests לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> in the presence הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> of the people

וַ֠יַּעַבְרוּ <S%H5674><s%> passed over בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children רְאוּבֵ֨ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben וּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the children גָ֜ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad וַחֲצִ֨י <S%H2677><s%> and half שֵׁ֤בֶט <S%H7626><s%> the tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּׁה֙ <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh חֲמֻשִׁ֔ים <S%H2571><s%> armed לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> as מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> as Moses

כְּאַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> About forty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand חֲלוּצֵ֣י <S%H2502><s%> prepared הַצָּבָ֑א <S%H6635><s%> for war עָבְר֞וּ <S%H5674><s%> passed over לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> unto battle אֶ֖ל <S%H413><s%> to עַֽרְב֥וֹת <S%H6160><s%> to the plains יְרִיחֽוֹ׃ <S%H3405><s%> of Jericho ס

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> On that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he גִּדַּ֤ל <S%H1431><s%> magnified יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua בְּעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of all Israel וַיִּֽרְא֣וּ <S%H3372><s%> and they feared אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> as they יָרְא֥וּ <S%H3372><s%> him as they feared אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> all the days חַיָּֽיו׃ <S%H2416><s%> of his life פ
וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

צַוֵּה֙ <S%H6680><s%> Command אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests נֹשְׂאֵ֖י <S%H5375><s%> that bear אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הָעֵד֑וּת <S%H5715><s%> of the testimony וְיַעֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> that they come up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> out of Jordan

וַיְצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> therefore commanded יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying עֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> Come ye up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> out of Jordan

וַ֠יְהִי <S%H1961><s%> came [בַּעֲלֹות כ] (כַּעֲלֹ֨ות <S%H5927><s%> arise ק) הַכֹּהֲנִ֜ים <S%H3548><s%> And it came to pass when the priests נֹשְׂאֵ֨י <S%H5375><s%> that bare אֲר֤וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> out of the midst הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan נִתְּק֗וּ <S%H5423><s%> were lifted up כַּפּוֹת֙ <S%H3709><s%> [and] the soles רַגְלֵ֣י <S%H7272><s%> feet הַכֹּהֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests' אֶ֖ל <S%H413><s%> to הֶחָרָבָ֑ה <S%H2724><s%> unto the dry land וַיָּשֻׁ֤בוּ <S%H7725><s%> returned מֵֽי־ <S%H4325><s%> that the waters הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan לִמְקוֹמָ֔ם <S%H4725><s%> unto their place וַיֵּלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> and went כִתְמוֹל־ <S%H8543><s%> as שִׁלְשׁ֖וֹם <S%H8032><s%> [they did] before עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גְּדוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H1415><s%> over all his banks

וְהָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> And the people עָלוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> came up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> out of Jordan בֶּעָשׂ֖וֹר <S%H6218><s%> on the tenth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <S%H7223><s%> [day] of the first וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <S%H2583><s%> and encamped בַּגִּלְגָּ֔ל <S%H1537><s%> in Gilgal בִּקְצֵ֖ה <S%H7097><s%> border מִזְרַ֥ח <S%H4217><s%> in the east יְרִיחֽוֹ׃ <S%H3405><s%> of Jericho
